projects.name: Fitness Hub
projects.description: Track steps, water, weight & supps offline. Stay healthy with no ads! Your fitness journey starts now!

projects.name: Mi Codere
projects.description: Join, raise your bets, and earn points that you can redeem for fantastic rewards. Additionally, if available in your community, you can cash out your bets early and manage all your tickets from the app.

projects.name: Codere LATAM
projects.description: In the Codere Club, you'll find information about events, promotions, the location of our venues, and much more. Check your points and redeem them.

projects.name: Push Agent
projects.description: Push notification agent. It includes an embedded server, a database, and a system to send push notifications completely free of charge.

projects.name: LTA+
projects.description: I am involved in developing an aerospace calculator app for military inflight operations.

projects.name: Blazebooks
projects.description: You'll immerse yourself in stories where every choice you make impacts the plot development and the fate of the characters. Interactive novels platform.

projects.name: Blaze Server
projects.description: NodeJS/NestJS server for Blazebooks app. User, files and database management.

projects.name: Rainclouds Web
projects.description: A website for the Atmospheric Black Metal band RAZAK. It was in production for a few years.

projects.name: Demiurge
projects.description: The word 'demiurge' is a word derived form of the Greek dēmiourgós. It was a noun meaning 'craftsman' or 'artisan', but gradually came to mean 'producer' and eventually 'creator'.
